title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 311 - Change Of Residence
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 311 - Change Of Residence

State Regulations
§ 311.1 - Assistance, care and services to recipients of grants from other States
§ 311.2 - New York State recipients who are temporarily absent from the district of administration
§ 311.3 - New York State recipients who change residence
§ 311.4 - Continuing responsibility of district of former residence

Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. tit. 18, ch. II, subch. A, art. 2, pt. 311

Statutory authority: Social Services Law, §§20, 34, 62, 131-a, 355

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
